text: Ronald Leslie Moore (8 March 1933 – 18 August 2018) was an Australian-born New Zealand international speedway rider. He won the Individual World Speedway Championship twice, in 1954 and 1959. Moore was born in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia. He died on 18 August 2018 from lung cancer at age 85.Nie żyje Ronnie Moore. title: Ronnie Moore (speedway rider)
